TextView.android:text: For one of my classes, I had to create a payroll management system using PL/SQL. I had to create a database using existing data, then perform weekly payroll operations on each employee.\n\nIn addition, each employee's PTO was handled by this system. This was implemented on a webserver using Oracle's forms and reports software.
\nI have also use SQL databases in a large majority of all my other projects including multiple different variants.
